info.title: Restaurant Management System API
info.description: API documentation for Restaurant Management System Backend

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT tokens

message.example: Invalid credentials or account is not active

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token from cookie

get.description: Get current authenticated user information
Get all active refresh token sessions for the authenticated user

post.description: Register a new user account with email verification

message.example: Registration initiated. Please check your email to verify your account.
User with this email already exists

get.description: Complete user registration by verifying email with token

message.example: Account created successfully. You can now login.

post.description: Resend email verification for pending registration

message.example: No pending registration found for this email

get.description: Generate Google OAuth redirect URL for authentication

500.description: Failed to generate Google login URL

message.example: Failed to generate Google login URL

get.description: Process Google OAuth callback and login/register user
Retrieve a paginated list of customers with optional filters
Retrieve a specific customer with their user information

put.description: Update customer profile and optionally update their user account (email, password)

patch.description: Update the membership level of a customer

get.description: Retrieve all dining tables with pagination
Retrieve a specific dining table by ID
Retrieve all dish categories with pagination and optional search by name

delete.description: Delete a dish category. If any dishes are linked, deletion is prevented.

400.description: Cannot delete category with linked dishes

get.summary: Lấy danh sách tên danh mục món ăn
get.description: Trả về danh sách {id, name} của các danh mục món ăn

200.description: Danh sách tên danh mục món ăn

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of employees with optional filters

post.description: Create a new employee along with their user account for login

role_id.description: Role ID for the user account

201.description: Employee created successfully with user account

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific employee by ID

put.description: Update employee information and optionally update their user account (email, password, role)

patch.description: Toggle the active status of an employee

is_active.description: Set to true to activate, false to deactivate

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of employee shift assignments with optional filters

post.description: Assign a shift to an employee on a given date

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific employee shift assignment

patch.description: Mark an employee as checked-in for a shift

notes.example: Arrived slightly late due to traffic

patch.description: Mark an employee as checked-out from a shift and optionally record overtime
Manually update the status or notes of a shift assignment

get.description: Returns the current status of the API

message.example: Restaurant Management System API is running

put.summary: Cập nhật trạng thái nhiều OrderItem

200.description: Order items and order status updated successfully

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of payrolls with filters for employee, status, month, and year
Retrieve detailed information about a specific payroll, including items and approver

put.description: Update base salary, bonus, deductions, or metadata for a payroll

post.description: Generate payrolls for active employees for a specific month and year

patch.description: Change the status of a payroll record and optionally update notes
Record payment details for a payroll and mark it as paid

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of payroll items with optional filters

post.description: Add an earning or deduction item to a payroll

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific payroll item

put.description: Update amount, code, or description for a payroll item

delete.description: Remove a payroll item and recalculate the payroll total

get.description: Retrieve all permissions with pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search permissions by name or code

get.description: Retrieve a specific permission by ID
Get all roles that have this permission
Retrieve a paginated list of roles with optional filters

permissions.description: Array of permission IDs to assign to role

get.description: Retrieve a specific role with permissions
Get all permissions assigned to a role

post.description: Assign specific permissions to a role

delete.description: Remove specific permissions from a role

put.description: Replace all role permissions with the provided list

get.description: Get all users assigned to a role
Retrieve a paginated list of shifts with optional time filters

parameters.name: start_time_from
parameters.description: Filter shifts starting after or at this time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: start_time_to
parameters.description: Filter shifts starting before or at this time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: end_time_from
parameters.description: Filter shifts ending after or at this time (HH:MM)

parameters.name: end_time_to
parameters.description: Filter shifts ending before or at this time (HH:MM)

post.description: Create a new shift by providing name and working timeframe

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific shift

delete.description: Remove a shift if it's not assigned to employees

200.description: Danh sách bàn và phiên bàn

get.summary: Lấy thông tin phiên bàn theo Dining Table ID
get.description: Trả về phiên bàn (status = 1 - đang phục vụ) kèm thông tin đặt chỗ và khách hàng

parameters.name: idDiningTable
parameters.description: ID của Dining Table (ví dụ: DT4PP4X0GT)

200.description: Thông tin phiên bàn lấy thành công

404.description: Không tìm thấy phiên bàn đang phục vụ

message.example: Không tìm thấy phiên bàn đang phục vụ cho Dining Table: DT4PP4X0GT

get.summary: Lấy danh sách Order theo Table Session ID
get.description: Trả về danh sách order và chi tiết order_items kèm thông tin món ăn và category

parameters.name: tableSessionId
parameters.description: ID của Table Session (ví dụ: TSPC3JAEON)

200.description: Danh sách order lấy thành công

404.description: Không tìm thấy orders cho Table Session

message.example: Không tìm thấy orders cho Table Session: TSPC3JAEON

get.summary: Lấy lịch sử phiên bàn theo Dining Table
get.description: Trả về danh sách các phiên bàn đã hoàn thành hoặc bị hủy, kèm thông tin reservation nếu có

200.description: Lịch sử phiên bàn retrieved successfully

404.description: Không tìm thấy lịch sử phiên bàn

get.summary: Xem lịch sử chi tiết một phiên bàn
get.description: Trả về tất cả thông tin liên quan tới một phiên bàn: bàn, reservation, khách hàng, orders và món ăn
Retrieve all users with pagination
Retrieve a specific user by ID

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in format: Bearer {token}
